thread.title: Mozilla Bug Tracker Hacked, Data About Firefox Vulnerabilities Stolen
thread.title_full: Mozilla Bug Tracker Hacked, Data About Firefox Vulnerabilities Stolen

title: Mozilla Bug Tracker Hacked, Data About Firefox Vulnerabilities Stolen
text: Mozilla Bug Tracker Hacked, Data About Firefox Vulnerabilities Stolen Saturday, 5 September 2015 (16 minutes ago) Mozilla engineers have revealed that their bug tracking application was compromised, and an unknown attacker had accessed a privileged account which had access to sensitive information about unpatched Firefox vulnerabilities. According to the foundation's security disclosure, they confirmed the attacker had access to the bug tracker since September 201... A privileged user's account was compromised at least as early as September 2014. Ars Technica 7 hours ago - Technology Firefox users were targeted via a browser exploit that was patched last month, after a hacker broke into Mozilla’s bug-tracking system ‘Bugzilla’ to... The Next Web 12 hours ago - Internet (Reuters) - Mozilla, creator of the Firefox web browser, said hackers had stolen security-sensitive information from Bugzilla, its bug tracker, and used it to... Reuters 12 hours ago - Technology You Might Like
